extendedInfo.description: Filmgrain is the new movie app that makes it easy to find out which movies people are excited about, fast. The moment you open the Filmgrain app, you see the most popular movies in theaters and which upcoming movies are generating the most buzz. With Filmgrain, youâll know which movie you should go see and what movies your friends are eager to see as well.Not only do you see which movies are trending, you can watch what people are saying about the movie. This means you can watch what real people are saying on Twitter about any new movie. The streams for movies that have just opened are always very exciting!And of course you can also get local movie theater showtimes, watch tailers & clips, see the movie theater release date, and more.

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: Just a great way to see what\'s trending as far as what the popular opinion on a movie is. I would love to see a feature in the app that allows me to mark a movie as \"want to see\", that way, I can keep a list of movies I want to see in the future.
reviews.author: John Dominici

reviews.title: Kinda flawed
reviews.comment: People are writing irrelevant tweets with the word passion in it and the movie Passion is at the front page at the top. What they\'re tweeting has nothing to do with the movie.
reviews.author: Rohail Shah

reviews.comment: Only movie app I use
reviews.author: Michael Whitworth

reviews.title: Near excellence.
reviews.comment: Concept is well executed. Easy way to see how active a movie is socially. Could add some reminder functionality or add to calendar functionality and maybe a few visual tweeks.
reviews.author: Dominic Powell

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Please include showtimes and theaters near me, so I can delete flixster. 5 star after that.
reviews.author: rigor royena

reviews.title: Good app but more functionality are welcomed
reviews.comment: Hope 2 see more features added! ;) but its really best in its class!
reviews.author: Sabin Bajracharya

reviews.title: Surprisingly smooth
reviews.comment: Surprisingly smooth and simple. The app doesn\'t clutter itself with too much information, and presents everything in a simple, Google Now Cards-style interface.  I would love for some extra functionality too such as reminders and bookmarks.  Also, if the developer decided to make an identical app for television shows, I would download it in a second.
reviews.author: Hubert Wang

reviews.title: Pretty Darn Cool
reviews.comment: Interesting and effective. If the rotten tomatoes reviews were visible from the main \"in theaters\" and \"upcoming\" cards instead of just the \"details\" card, and if showtimes were visible in the app instead of linking to the google movies website, this app would be absolutely perfect.
reviews.author: Taylor Sellers

reviews.title: Cool app for the avid moviegoer
reviews.comment: Nice clean format. provides useful info about the movie and what everyone is saying about the movie all in one place.
reviews.author: Celia Song

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: I do feel like I wish I had landscape though
reviews.author: Adolfo Nuncio

reviews.comment: Excellent, just need showtimes at theatres nearby!
reviews.author: Lynton Schoeman

reviews.title: Excellent execution
reviews.comment: Pretty well-designed and implemented app. The animations are delightful.
reviews.author: Yarian Gomez

reviews.comment: Great UI and informative
reviews.author: Phyoe Wai

reviews.comment: Looks good and remarkably easy to use. Well done!
reviews.author: Bernardo Raul Vela

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Would love integration with Flixster\'s watch list but don\'t know if there\'s an API for that
reviews.author: Roman Nurik

reviews.title: Excellent idea
reviews.comment: Finally an app for new movies that doesn\'t just rely on the reviews of critics. A good feature for the future might be to allow users to sort movies by best rating, alphabetical, newest, etc.
reviews.author: Austin Canfield

reviews.title: Great job..
reviews.comment: Beautiful and simple UI... Great content. Love the app.
reviews.author: Asher Powers

reviews.title: Nice idea
reviews.comment: and good execution, but this doesn\'t give much more functionality than a Twitter search
reviews.author: Tom Rosser-Davies

reviews.comment: Great flow, sleek design
reviews.author: Sanil Sampat

reviews.comment: So useful
reviews.author: Alex Hill
